title: 'India got best deal': Goyal hails trade pact with US; credits PM for protecting farm, dairy sectors
content: Union commerce minister Piyush Goyal on Tuesday described the India‚ÄìUS trade agreement as a ‚Äútremendous opportunity‚Äù for the country, calling it the best deal India has secured compared to its neighbours. Addressing a press conference he said that the pact sends positive signals for the future and will benefit all citizens.

title: 'Blot on democracy': Rahul writes to LS Speaker; says 'prevented' from speaking in House
content: Rahul Gandhi has lodged a strong protest with Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla, citing his inability to speak on the President's address.  Gandhi claims he was prevented from quoting an unpublished book by former Army Chief General MM Naravane on the India-China clashes, calling it a "blot on our democracy" and a deliberate government attempt to silence him.

title: After 1 yr of prez rule, Manipur to get new CM - who is Yumnam Singh
content: Bharatiya Janata Party's Yumnam Khemchand has been elected as the leader of the legislative party and is set to become the new chief minister of Manipur. This development follows a meeting of BJP legislative members in Delhi. Khemchand, a senior leader, previously served as the assembly speaker and a cabinet minister.

title: T20 World Cup: 'India vs Pakistan presented as war now,' says J&K CM Omar Abdullah
content: Omar Abdullah, the Chief Minister of Jammu and Kashmir, expressed disappointment over Pakistan's decision to withdraw from the T20 World Cup match against India, underscoring the troubling overlap of sports and politics. He pointed out that the hype surrounding India-Pakistan games often leads to unnecessary disputes.

title: Police raid France offices of Musk's X, what Telegram CEO Pavel Durov said
content: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov criticized France's government after authorities raided X's Paris offices as part of an investigation into suspected child pornography, unlawful data extraction, and deepfakes generated by its AI chatbot. The French prosecutor's office confirmed summoning Elon Musk and Linda Yaccarino to hearings, while X denies the allegations, calling the probe politically motivated.

title: Man drowns daughter to stay eligible for poll; how WhatsApp pic exposed the crime
content: A father aspiring to contest Maharashtra panchayat elections, ineligible due to the two-child norm, allegedly drowned his six-year-old twin daughter in a Telangana canal. The accused, Pandurang Kondamangale, confessed after his daughter's body was found. The outgoing sarpanch, who encouraged him, was also arrested for aiding the plot.

title: Unsold in IPL, Australia great joins PSL team for debut campaign
content: Former Australia captain Steve Smith has signed with PSL newcomers Sialkot Stallionz for the 2026 season, marking his first appearance in the league. Signed directly under league rules, Smith is expected to play a key leadership role. Despite going unsold in the IPL, he remains a top T20 performer after impressing in the Big Bash League.

title: Oracle makes a public clarification on the deal that could end up in 30,000 job cuts
content: Oracle is defending its substantial AI partnership with OpenAI amidst reports of potential job cuts to fund infrastructure. Despite a stalled Nvidia deal, Oracle remains confident in OpenAI's funding capabilities. However, the company's massive debt and market cap decline raise investor concerns about its ambitious AI spending plans.

title: Now representing USA, Ranjane looking to play against ‚Äòbest buddy‚Äô SKY
content: Former Mumbai allrounder Shubham Ranjane, now representing USA, is reliving nostalgic moments after returning to Mumbai for the T20 World Cup. Excited to play at Wankhede, meet close friend Suryakumar Yadav, and face India, Ranjane calls it a proud, emotional homecoming as family cheers him on.

title: Jeff Bezos‚Äôs rocket company Blue Origin is pausing space tourism, here‚Äôs why
content: Blue Origin is halting its New Shepard space tourism flights for at least two years. The company is reallocating resources to accelerate its human moon-landing capabilities for NASA's lunar program. This decision impacts the reusable rocket system that has flown 98 passengers to the edge of space, shifting focus to America's lunar ambitions.

title: 'It is about tariff reduction': FM Sitharaman on India-US trade deal
content: India and the US have finalized a trade deal, reducing US tariffs on Indian goods from 25% to 18%. Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman confirmed the tariff reduction, calling it "very good news." President Trump announced the agreement, highlighting increased "BUY AMERICAN" commitments from India and over $500 billion in US product purchases.

title: 'Take immediate action‚Äô: MEA condemns theft of Mahatma Gandhi statue in Australia
content: India's Ministry of External Affairs has strongly condemned the theft of Mahatma Gandhi's bronze statue from the Australian Indian Community Centre in Melbourne. The ministry has urged Australian authorities to take immediate action to recover the statue and hold the perpetrators accountable for the act.

title: Pressure mounts on Patrick Mahomes as Chiefs prepare for roster changes
content: The Kansas City Chiefs enter a difficult offseason as injuries, expiring contracts, and salary cap limits collide. Patrick Mahomes remains the focus, but Travis Kelce‚Äôs future and rising player costs complicate decisions. With many players nearing free agency, Kansas City must carefully balance loyalty, money, and long-term stability heading toward the 2026 season.

title: 'Our Prime Minister compromised, sold our nation': Rahul Gandhi outside Parliament after LS snub
content: Rahul Gandhi accused Prime Minister Narendra Modi of being "compromised" and "selling out" India's progress in a recent trade deal with the US, claiming it was signed under "immense pressure.

title: Stefon Diggs sparks Super Bowl buzz, says Cardi B proposal is 'on the agenda'
content: As Stefon Diggs gets ready for the Super Bowl, attention has shifted beyond football to his relationship with Cardi B. The couple, who have been together for over a year and share a baby boy, have faced questions about what comes next. Asked about a possible proposal, Diggs brushed it off, saying he needs to ‚Äúget mine first‚Äù before thinking about a ring.

title: Another Indian! After Pragg, Norway Chess 2026 reveals 4th participant
content: Reigning world champion Gukesh Dommaraju has been confirmed as the fourth participant for Norway Chess 2026, joining fellow Indian R Praggnanandhaa. The youngest world champion in history, Gukesh returns after a strong 2025 showing and a memorable win over Magnus Carlsen, highlighting India‚Äôs growing dominance in world chess.

title: The loss that roared like a win: When India pushed Australia to the edge in Adelaide 1978
content: India's 1977/78 tour of Australia saw a remarkable turnaround. After losing the first two Tests, India secured their maiden wins Down Under, including a stunning series-levelling victory. The decider in Adelaide was a nail-biter, with India pushing Australia to the brink before ultimately losing the series 3-2.

title: Ishan out, Sanju in: India spinner announces playing XI vs USA in T20 World Cup
content: Despite a stellar T20I series, Ishan Kishan was surprisingly omitted from Yuzvendra Chahal's preferred XI for India's T20 World Cup opener. Chahal opted for the struggling Sanju Samson to open alongside Abhishek Sharma, a decision that raises eyebrows given Kishan's dominant recent form.

title: Man moves back to India after 7 successful years in US, compares with life in B'luru ‚Äî what he said
content: Many professionals are facing tough decisions whether to return to India after spending years in the US, finding the reality of daily life less ideological and more practical than online narratives suggested. While acknowledging genuine challenges like pollution and bureaucracy, he also noted similar issues abroad and found unexpected conveniences, leading him to not regret his decision.

title: Delhi man collapses on road, passerby tries to steal phone instead of helping; victim dies
content: In Delhi's Ranhola area, a man collapsed on the road and later died after a passerby attempted to steal his belongings instead of offering help. CCTV footage captured the incident, and police are now searching for the suspects. This tragic event echoes similar past incidents where victims were robbed instead of aided.

title: Iran tensions: IndiGo curbs flights to central Asian countries till Feb 28
content: Amidst escalating Iran tensions, IndiGo has extended flight cancellations to Tbilisi, Almaty, Baku, and Tashkent until February 28, 2026. The airline is rerouting to ensure passenger and crew safety, as its usual flight paths traverse Iranian airspace. This move comes as US-Iran relations remain volatile, though diplomatic efforts are reportedly underway.

title: 'Was ICC sleeping?' Ex-Pak star says 'PCB should not back down' amid India boycott row
content: Former Pakistan cricketer Kamran Akmal has slammed the ICC for urging the PCB to reconsider boycotting the India match at the T20 World Cup. Akmal questioned the ICC's past inaction on political issues affecting cricket between the two nations, including the Asia Cup and India's refusal to play in Pakistan.

title: Delhi HC allows Sameer Wankhede to continue defamation case in Mumbai over Aryan Khan series
content: IRS officer Sameer Wankhede has been permitted by the Delhi High Court to pursue his defamation case against the makers of 'The Ba***ds Of Bollywood' in Mumbai. The court found it lacked territorial jurisdiction, allowing Wankhede to refile his suit in Mumbai. The show is accused of defaming Wankhede through a character based on the Aryan Khan drugs case.

title: Drake Maye‚Äôs wife Ann Michael stuns in daring Super Bowl week workout post
content: Ann Michael Maye kicked off Super Bowl 2026 week with a viral workout post as the Patriots prepare to face the Seahawks. From supporting Drake Maye at key playoff moments to launching her NBC Sports Boston show, Ann‚Äôs rise mirrors New England‚Äôs return to the sport‚Äôs biggest stage.

title: No rituals, no marriage: SC says certificate can‚Äôt replace Hindu ceremonies
content: The Petitioner- woman and Respondent- man, both trained commercial pilots, were engaged on 07.03.2021. They claimed in their own words, instead of immediately performing marriage as per traditional Hindu ceremony, they obtained a marriage certificate dated 07.07.2021, from a private organization called Vadik Jankalyan Samiti (Regd.). And later, based on that certificate, obtained a certificate of registration of marriage in Uttar Pradesh as per rules.

title: 'Physically handicapped': Khawaja Asif's brutal admission as Pakistan forces battle BLA
content: Pakistan's defence minister acknowledges the immense challenge of policing Balochistan's vast terrain. Security forces are battling a recent surge in militant violence.  Authorities report killing 177 insurgents in counter-terror operations.  The minister ruled out talks with groups responsible for civilian deaths.  This highlights the ongoing security crisis in the region.

title: MP govt hospitals to get Garbh Sanskar rooms to ‚Äòeducate mind of fetus‚Äô
content: These dedicated spaces are meant to guide expectant parents through prenatal care rooted in traditional Indian practices, from positive thinking and lifestyle discipline to diet and emotional well-being. The idea: shape the mind of the unborn. CM Mohan Yadav announced the initiative Sunday in Indore, placing it under the Ayushman Bharat scheme and linking it to the Union ministry of Ayush.

title: Parents to be blamed for allowing minors to drink & drive: SC
content: A bench of Justices B V Nagarathna and Ujjal Bhuyan said that there cannot be punishment before trial and directed release of the accused who already spent 18 months in jail. They were allegedly involved in tampering of evidence by swapping blood samples of their kids with their own. Father of the main accused, who is a minor and was allegedly driving the case, is still in jail.

title: How long you will live is mainly decided by your genes: Study
content: The findings are based on an analysis of more than a century of lifespan data from large Scandinavian twin cohorts in Denmark and Sweden. Researchers studied identical and non-identical twins raised together and apart, as well as siblings of US centenarians. Most participants were born between 1870 and 1935, a period marked by high mortality from infectious diseases and accidents.

title: NHL trade buzz: Artemi Panarin rumours and Barry Trotz exit shake up deadline
content: The current NHL trade rumors center on New York Rangers player Artemi Panarin, who wants to sign a contract extension before he joins another team, which includes the Kings, Capitals, and Red Wings as potential suitors. The Nashville Predators are currently searching for a new general manager while they consider trading Ryan O'Reilly, Michael Bunting, Michael McCarron, and Nick Perbix before the March 6 trade deadline.

title: Imran Khan opens up about divorce with Avantika Malik
content: Actor Imran Khan returns to cinema after an 11-year hiatus, focusing on his mental health journey. He reveals that ending his marriage in 2019 was a turning point, enabling him to heal and become his healthiest self. Khan emphasizes that remaining in an unhealthy dynamic is more damaging than separation, especially for a child.

title: 'Border 2' box office collection, day 12: Film touches Rs 280 crore
content: Border 2 continues its strong box office run, earning Rs 5.25 crore nett on its second Monday. Despite a natural dip, the film has maintained momentum, with a week 1 collection of Rs 224.25 crore and a total of Rs 281.7 crore. North India remains a dominant territory for the film.

title: Air India flyers land in Delhi, 40 bags left in Mumbai
content: Passengers on a Mumbai-Delhi Air India flight experienced frustration when approximately 40 checked bags failed to arrive at their destination. The airline cited unforeseen technical issues at Mumbai airport for the missing cargo. The flight, AI 2677, landed ahead of schedule, but the early arrival was overshadowed by the luggage mishap.

title: Epstein Files: The conspiracy theory about Stanley Kubrick's death
content: What the thread is really selling is not a claim about 1999. It is a mood about now. A belief that the powerful do unspeakable things behind closed doors, and that anyone who shows us the door gets removed from the building.

title: 'Effort to win trophies will continue': Rohit after being conferred Padma Shri
content: Rohit Sharma, honored with the Padma Shri, expressed deep gratitude for the prestigious civilian award, calling it a momentous occasion for his family. He reaffirmed his unwavering dedication to securing victories for India on the cricket field. This recognition celebrates his significant contributions as both a player and captain, marking a distinguished chapter in his illustrious career.

title: 'Daan' at Haryana YouTuber Arun Pawar's wedding; Rs 71L cash, 21 tola gold
content: A YouTuber's wedding video showcasing substantial cash and gold gifts, termed 'daan' by the family, has ignited a fierce online debate about dowry. Critics question influencers normalizing such practices, especially given the bride's professional achievements. The controversy highlights the persistent issue of dowry, even when disguised as tradition.

title: ‚ÄòNo big deal‚Äô: Manjrekar says India's wins over Pak now feel like beating 'minnows'
content: Former cricketer Sanjay Manjrekar believes the potential India-Pakistan T20 World Cup match cancellation is insignificant, stating the rivalry has lost its competitive edge. He argues India now dominates, making encounters feel one-sided, unlike past contests. Manjrekar asserts the tournament's value remains unaffected by this fixture's absence.

title: Sources: Kraft not selected for HOF Class of 2026
content: Patriots owner Robert Kraft, like his former head coach Bill Belichick, was not selected for entry into this year's Pro Football Hall of Fame class, sources told ESPN.

title: Clippers, Harden exploring trade, sources say
content: The LA Clippers and James Harden are exploring trades ahead of Thursday's deadline, with the Cavaliers one of the teams expressing interest.

title: Sources: Bucks countering trade offers for Giannis
content: The Bucks have submitted counteroffers to teams aggressively seeking a trade for two-time MVP Giannis Antetokounmpo, sources told ESPN.

title: Seattle's Kubiak 'all-in' on LX amid Raiders buzz
content: Asked about reports that he's expected to become the next head coach of the Raiders, Seahawks OC Klint Kubiak said his sole focus is on the Super Bowl.

title: NFL to reevaluate Rooney Rule: 'More work to do'
content: NFL commissioner Roger Goodell said Monday that the league will take a closer a look at the Rooney Rule and all that it encompasses after an offseason hiring cycle that saw only one of 10 head-coaching jobs go to a minority candidate.

title: Peterson gives KU 35 minutes, 2 clutch 3s in win
content: Darryn Peterson was happy to finally finish a game for No. 11 Kansas, and the Jayhawks certainly needed the standout freshman at the end against No. 13 Texas Tech.

title: Melo IG post hints at frustration with Cuse hoops
content: Syracuse alum Carmelo Anthony does not appear happy with the current state of the program, commenting "SMFH" under a highlight from Monday's loss to UNC.

title: M's get Cards All-Star Donovan in 3-team trade
content: The Mariners acquired infielder/outfielder Brendan Donovan, a first-time All-Star last season, from the Cardinals.

title: Three Alberta junior hockey players killed in crash
content: Three Southern Alberta Mustangs junior hockey players -- JJ Wright, Cameron Casorso and Caden Fine -- were killed Monday morning in a vehicle crash while heading to practice.

content: Matt Miller goes two rounds deep in his latest mock. Which prospects rose after the Senior Bowl? Which teams need quarterbacks?

content: Abdul Carter to the Jets? Tyler Shough to the Browns? Emeka Egbuka to the 49ers? We repicked the first two rounds of last year's NFL draft.

content: In a sprint to the early signing period, Franklin gutted his former school and brought life to the Hokies.

title: The art of the pregame outfit and the stylist behind the NFL's crossover with fashion
content: From pregame style to fashion week, NFL fashion editor Kyle Smith helps players level up their style.

content: From Bruno Mars to Gloria Estefan, a wide array of superstars has graced the Super Bowl halftime stage.

title: Super Bowl LX Patriots-Seahawks media day: Top quotes, moments, highlights
content: Before the Seattle Seahawks and New England Patriots take the field for Super Bowl LX, media day festivities took place on Monday.

title: Bubble Watch: Tracking which teams will make (or miss) the NCAA tournament
content: How are your team's chances to make the Big Dance shaping up in the final six weeks until Selection Sunday?

title: Bracketology: The hottest team in America is Illinois
content: The Fighting Illini are the top 2-seed -- with plenty of time this season to move further up the board.

title: Bracketology: Out of projected field in December, Duke now back in top 16
content: The Blue Devils, up one line to a No. 4 seed, have won 13 straight games and sit atop the ACC with Louisville.

title: Sweets, socks, shoes: The superstitions behind the unbeaten run for Miami (Ohio)
content: Lucky game-day socks. Unlucky shoes from bad games. Here's a look inside the RedHawks' quest for perfection.

title: Premier League desperation rankings: Judging all 20 teams by transfer panic
content: The winter transfer window: when teams make desperation moves to save their season. Which Premier League teams were most desperate this time?

title: What makes Abbey Murphy one of the most exciting players in women's hockey
content: The USA and Minnesota star's game features highlight-reel assists and goals, penalties and physical play.

title: Five stars to trade for or trade away
content: Giannis Antetokounmpo, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Michael Porter Jr. are three of the most commonly traded players right now in ESPN fantasy. If you deal them, here's who you should get in return -- and who you should avoid.

title: Is it time to talk about Guardiola at Man City? Plus: Real Madrid booed, more
content: Are we approaching the end of the Pep Guardiola era at Man City? Plus: Man United grab another win and Real Madrid get booed heavily at home, as Gab Marcotti recaps the weekend.

title: Way-too-early Grand Slam predictions for the rest of 2026
content: Carlos Alcaraz and Elena Rybakina are the newly crowned Australian Open champions. Who will win the rest of the majors? We make predictions.

title: Stevenson claims No. 1 spot in new division
content: Shakur Stevenson is the top-ranked fighter in two divisions following a dominant win over Teofimo Lopez Jr. Here are the latest ESPN divisional rankings.

title: Blot on democracy: Rahul Gandhi lodges protest with Lok Sabha Speaker for not being allowed to speak
content: In his letter to Om Birla, the Congress leader noted that while speaking on the Motion on the President's address on February 2, the Speaker had directed him to authenticate a magazine which he intended to refer to while raising the India-China conflict of 2020

title: Cabinet subcommittee tasked with studying PM SHRI in Kerala yet to meet
content: The committee was formed last year after the State government put the implementation of the scheme on hold following opposition from the Communist Party of India (CPI).

title: Severe traffic congestion to hit ORR as 11-month deadline set for facelift project of ‚Äòinternational standard‚Äô
content: The project aims to revamp the 17.1-km stretch with high-quality roads, international-standard footpaths and cycle lanes, and a well-planned bus priority lane

title: Steady rise in cancer cases in Telangana as doctors stress early detection ahead of World Cancer Day
content: Cases in Telangana rose from 40,177 in 2015 to 52,334 in 2024, according to data shared in Parliament; head and neck cancers linked to tobacco chewing highly prevalent in the region

title: Khemchand Singh elected Manipur BJP legislature party leader
content: Manipur has been under President‚Äôs rule since February 13, 2025. The 60-member Assembly was put on suspended animation after President‚Äôs rule was imposed

title: Three-day Chilli Mela in Hubballi from Friday
content: Around 100 chilli farmers are expected to participate in the 14th annual mela on Moorusavir Mutt High School Grounds

title: Law and order worsening in Andhra Pradesh, allege YSRCP MPs
content: Raising the issue in Parliament, they seek Central intervention to restore normalcy; they also demand enhanced funding for the Polavaram project

content: Leader of the Opposition V.D. Satheesan says High Court flagged an ‚Äúinvestigative laxity‚Äù in the probe, which cast doubt in public mind.¬†Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan says Opposition cherry-picked an observation made by a Single Bench while hearing bail plea to make a false case against government

title: Act tough on shops selling liquor at inflated price, Pawan Kalyan tells Excise officials
content: Overpricing liquor not only violates regulations but also damages the credibility of the government, observes the Deputy Chief Minister in a social media post

title: While Trump has said India will buy more Venezuelan oil, Indian refiners have cited difficulties
content: In an investor call earlier this month, officials at Hindustan Petroleum had underlined the Venezuelan crude to be bottom-heavy, having high viscosity and acid number

title: ‚ÄòAdditional sugarcane price to be credited to farmers within 10 days‚Äô
content: The government has also fixed an additional ‚Çπ100 per tonne for sugarcane and the Finance Department had already released the required funds

title: Army flags off ‚ÄòBharat Ranbhoomi Darshan‚Äô expedition from Dwarka
content: The expedition team will travel over 3,400 km along India‚Äôs western frontier, covering key border regions of Gujarat and Rajasthan, before culminating the journey at the National War Memorial in New Delhi

title: LDF and UDF on collision path over Ethics Committee weighing Mamkootathil‚Äôs Assembly disqualification
content: Leader of the Opposition V.D. Satheesan said the committee lacked the legislative competency to disqualify an elected member from the Assembly, with the rider that the Congress was not defending Mr. Mamkootathil¬†

title: Pennaiyar dispute: T.N. welcomes SC direction, hopes Centre will form tribunal for sharing water with Karnataka
content: Tamil Nadu‚Äôs Minister for Water Resources Duraimurugan says Tamil Nadu will take up all necessary measures to get water from the Pennaiyar and the Markandeya

title: Revenue e-literacy project launched in Chathannur
content: The project is designed to train citizens to access government services such as paying land tax or applying for certificates directly through their mobile phones.

title: Tariff reduction by the U.S. augurs well for aquaculture sector in Andhra Pradesh, says Fisheries Minister Atchannaidu
content: Duty concessions in Union Budget and stable demand from the non-U.S. markets will further strengthen the sector, benefiting farmers, fishermen and the State‚Äôs fisheries economy, he says

title: Sreedharan‚Äôs Ponnani office meant to mislead public: Govindan
content: He says there is little chance of the Centre approving his programme as the Union Railway Minister is silent on the issue

title: Idukki on high alert after receiving multiple bomb threats
content: Searches were conducted at the targeted sites including Mullaperiyar and Idukki dams, District Court, and District Collectorate

title: Union Budget 2026: No cheer in Rakhigarhi over plan to develop Harappan cultural site
content: Residents claiming that little work has been carried out at the site since a similar announcement was made in the 2020-21 Union Budget

title: Centre says NSA affords it power to shift Wangchuk to Rajasthan; he was treated fairly
content: In Supreme Court, Solicitor General Tushar Mehta refers to Section 5 of the National Security Act (NSA), 1980 which armed the ‚Äòappropriate government‚Äô with the power to ‚Äòregulate place and conditions of detention‚Äô

title: India‚Äôs exports to get further boost: Sitharaman on U.S. tariff cut announcement
content: India and the U.S. have agreed to a trade deal under which Washington will bring down the reciprocal tariff on Indian goods to 18%

title: Underground rail link along 'Chicken's Neck' corridor will ensure secure route to Northeast: Assam CM Himanta Biswa Sarma
content: The Chief Minister of Assam said the "strategic vulnerability" of the narrow strip of land should have been addressed in the aftermath of 1971

title: Harassment of Kashmiris outside J&K flagged in Assembly
content: Mehbooba Mufti of the Opposition PDP accuses the ruling NC of silence as lawmakers seek Centre‚Äôs intervention.

content: ‚ÄúThe number of LWE-affected districts reduced from 126 in 2018 to only eight in December 2025, with only three districts now remaining the most affected. The number of police stations reporting LWE-related violence has significantly reduced from 465 in 2010 to 119 in 2025,‚Äù says Nityanand Rai

title: Conservationists, researchers express apprehensions on ‚Äòturtle trails‚Äô announced in Union Budget
content: Under no circumstance, neither people nor light should enter mass nesting sites as endangered turtles get distracted by it, says B.C. Choudhary, a researcher on turtles

title: Tirupati laddu row: Tainted ghee supplier‚Äôs proxy supplied to TTD in February 2019, finds CBI charge sheet
content: By offering to supply ghee at ‚Çπ291 per kg, the company got its first contract to supply ghee in tins to the TTD way back in February 2019

title: Russia has not received any message from India about stopping oil purchases: Kremlin spokesman
content: Dmitry Peskov said that Russia intends to continue to develop its relations with India in every possible way

title: India-U.S. deal: Is Congress with India's interest or against it, asks BJP after Rahul Gandhi attacks PM Modi
content: "This anti-India mindset is clearly visible in Rahul Gandhi, the Congress and other opposition leaders, as they are not even allowing Parliament to function," Anurag Thakur said

title: SIR 'victims' not being given opportunity to defend themselves: Mamata Banerjee in Delhi
content: "Victims of the SIR process from Bengal, they represented many others who suffered due to the exercise. People sitting behind us are all SIR victims. I could have brought lakhs of people here," says Mamata Banerjee

title: MES Kalladi College signs MoU with Philippines college
content: The partnership is aimed at strengthening academic and research cooperation between the two institutions

title: Economic Survey calls for tackling rising digital addiction and screen-related mental health problems
content: The Survey highlights that the issue is of significance predominantly among children and adolescents; the document also proposes expanding the national Tele-MANAS programme beyond crisis counselling to actively address digital addiction

title: Further funds under APRA for infra development in Telangana‚Äôs backward districts ruled out; total amount released
content: Union Minister Pankaj Chaudhary says the assured amount of ‚Çπ2,700 crore was released in six instalments

title: Uttarakhand opens 83 Himalayan peaks, including Nanda Devi, for mountaineering
content: Uttarakhand Chief Minister Pushkar Singh Dhami said that these peaks are celebrated not only for their technical difficulty but also for their breathtaking natural beauty

content: The Congress leader highlighted two ‚Äúpressure points‚Äù ‚Äî Epstein files and an ongoing case against Gautam Adani in the U.S.

title: Amid uncertainty, Kerala decides to move ahead with first phase of RRTS project
content: Kerala Transport dept to submit proposal to Centre and initiate consultations to obtain clearances. The project is estimated to cost about ‚Çπ1,92,780 crore, according to an order

title: UP emerging as the first choice for foreign investors: CM Yogi Adityanath
content: Moller-Maersk has been investing in the state for over 20 years; discussions were held on new investment opportunities with the CM.

title: GM University hosts Budget 2026 panel discussion in Davanagere
content: Experts who took part in a panel discussion were of the opinion that the Union Budget 2026 is a vital step toward sustainable development

content: The Minister said it was neither the intention nor the desire of the ruling DMK to have TASMAC liquor shops. He claimed the Chief Minister was taking steps to bring about behavioural change among alcoholics in a phased manner.

content: Lok Sabha adjourns for the day after repeated adjournments over Rahul Gandhi‚Äôs remarks on India-China conflict

content: When asked for his message to his political opponents, Mr. Stalin¬†said,¬†‚ÄúI don‚Äôt consider anyone as enemies, I only see them as friends.‚Äù

content: Those interested can seek police assistance by sending a message to 8277951146, or meet the officials concerned before locking their houses for long periods

content: He emphasised the crucial role of next generation technologies, including AI, genome editing, genomics, phenomics, machine learning, robotics, drones, and big data analytics, in addressing future challenges in Indian agriculture

content: After taking the oath, he touched the feet of Chief Minister Nitish Kumar, his political mentor, before getting back into the prison vehicle

content: Though he had worked in Tamil, Kannada and Bengali, S.P. Venkatesh reserved his best for Malayalam cinema

title: 15-year-old boy dies after fall from apartment in Bengaluru, police book pub for serving liquor to minor
content: Investigations revealed that the minor had gone to Legacy Brewing Company, located within the RR Nagar police station limits, with his classmates, where he allegedly consumed alcohol and smoked.

title: Supreme Court adjourns to February 10 ED's plea against 'interference' by CM Mamata during I-PAC raids
content: The top court on January 15  said the West Bengal chief minister's alleged "obstruction" in ED's probe is "very serious" and agreed to examine if a State's law-enforcing agencies can interfere with any central agency's probe

content: However, no announcement has been made so far by the party with respect to the poll-bound Union Territory of Puducherry

title: What led to President‚Äôs rule in the strife-hit Manipur? The story so far

title: Veteran music director S.P. Venkatesh dies at 70
content: The acclaimed composer, known for his evocative scores and popular songs of the 1980s and 1990s, passed away in Chennai, leaving behind a defining Malayalam film legacy.

title: Stern action will be initiated if anyone violates Section-30: Parvatipuram SP Madhav Reddy
content: Madhav Reddy said the rule was imposed against the backdrop of agitations and protests which led to violence at other places in Andhra Pradesh

title: NDA Parliamentary Party meeting: The world is looking at India, says PM Modi
content: At the NDA Parliamentary Party meeting, the prime minister was felicitated for successfully concluding trade deals with 39 countries

title: Chennai triple murder of migrant family: Tamil Nadu government to facilitate shifting of bodies to Bihar
content: On reports that assistance was required to move the bodies of the three deceased to their native State, Chief Minister Stalin instructed authorities to facilitate it free of cost

title: Rename Ladki Bahin scheme after Ajit Pawar: NCP leader
content: The Ladki Bahin scheme was announced by Ajit Pawar when he was the Finance Minister and started in July 2024

title: Climate report: Warming trend persists in Kerala despite slight relief in 2025
content: According to Statement on Climate for the State of Kerala: 2025, temperatures remained higher than normal, though the year was significantly cooler than 2024 ‚Äì the warmest year on record for Kerala since observations began in 1901

title: Air India starts inspection of fuel control switches in its Boeing 787 planes
content: An Air India pilot on February 2 reported a defect with the fuel control switch of a Boeing 787-8 plane after operating the flight from London Heathrow to Bengaluru

title: Delegation demands proper maintenance of R.N. Shetty stadium in Dharwad
content: Among other things, the lone toilet and two urinals in the sports complex¬†are in poor condition, and unfit for use

content: The searches by the agency were carried out at a residential house in Hazari Bazar locality in the early hours

title: Adani Enterprises' Net Profit Surges 90 Times To Rs 5,627 Crore In Q3
content: Adani Enterprises Ltd (AEL), the flagship company of the Adani Group, on Tuesday registered an impressive 90 times growth in net profit at Rs 5,627 crore for the October-December quarter (Q3 FY26) year-on-year.

title: Consulting With Parties On Impeaching Poll Body Chief Over SIR: Trinamool
content: The Trinamool Congress will speak to other parties to discuss the possibility of making a move to impeach Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar, party MP Kalyan Banerjee told reporters today.

title: US Judge To Hear Request For 'Immediate Takedown' Of Epstein Files
content: A US federal judge said he would hear a request to block access to investigative files linked to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein on Wednesday, after lawyers flagged unredacted names of victims.

title: NDTV Ground Report: Surat Textile Traders Eye Export Boost After US Tariff Cuts
content: The industrial heartbeat of Gujarat, Surat, is witnessing a surge of optimism following the United States' decision to slash total tariffs on Indian imports from 50 per cent down to 18 per cent.

title: Video: Delhi Man Collapses On Street, Thieves Rob Him, Leave Him To Die
content: While he was lying on the ground, two men arrived on a two-wheeler and, instead of helping him, stole his mobile phone and fled, leaving the man to die.

title: How Thieves In Australia Stole 420 Kg Gandhi Statue In Melbourne
content: A bronze statue of Mahatma Gandhi has been stolen from outside the Australian Indian Community Centre in Rowville, Melbourne.

title: US Cut Tariffs, So They Announced It 1st: Piyush Goyal On Opposition Attacks
content: The trade deal with the US that came through after many hiccups and months of negotiations is the "best in the neighbourhood", Union minister Piyush Goyal said today.

title: Opinion: Opinion | 'Women Unfit For Leadership': On Bangladesh Jamaat's Ban On Women Candidates
content: In a recent interview with Al Jazeera, Jamaat-e-Islami chief Dr Shafiqur Rahman said, "On the question of women, Jamaat's position is neither confused nor apologetic - it is principled. We do not think women should come into leadership."

title: 3 Delivery Agents Beat Businessman To Death With Helmets In Delhi's Connaught Place
content: A 36-year-old businessman who went to a party at night was allegedly beaten to death by three food delivery riders in central Delhi's Connaught Place.

title: Historic First Phase Of India-US Trade Deal Sets Stage For FTA: Former Envoy
content: Former US Ambassador to India Kenneth I. Juster described the India-US trade understanding as "historic", saying it marks the first agreement of this magnitude between New Delhi and Washington and lays the foundation for a future free trade agreement

title: Defence To Be Significant Part Of Adani Group's Future Growth: Jeet Adani
content: Adani Defence & Aerospace Director Jeet Adani on Tuesday said that defence will emerge as a major and strategically important segment for the Adani Group, as the company strengthens its presence in aerospace, manufacturing, and localisation.

title: Behind China's Military Purge: Nuclear Missiles Filled With Water, Not Fuel
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping is overseeing a sweeping purge of China's military elite after a corruption scandal in the Rocket Force exposed missiles filled with water, faulty launch silos, and broken command systems.

title: "40,000 Voters Deleted In My Constituency": Mamata Banerjee Attacks Poll Body
content: Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee's allegations against the voter roll revision has grown sharper as elections in the state draw closer.

title: Opinion: Opinion | Pak's India Match Boycott: How To Self-Destruct To Make A 'Point'
content: In the long run, it will be Pakistan who will be wounded the most by this, left bleeding from not one but multiple cuts - hefty fines, potential legal action, and maybe even a ban. All for some chest-thumping.

title: 'Punjabi Devils' Bike Gang Leader Convicted In Arms Trafficking Case In US
content: Jashanpreet Singh, the 27-year-old founder and leader of the Punjabi Devils Motorcycle Club, has pleaded guilty in a federal court in the United States to charges related to illegal arms trafficking and possession of a machine gun.

title: Son Of Norway Crown Princess Pleads Not Guilty To Rapes As Trial Begins
content: The son of Norway's crown princess pleaded not guilty on Tuesday to four counts of rape at the opening of a trial that has embarrassed the royal family.

title: Russia Launches Drone, Missile Attack On Ukraine Day Ahead Of Fresh Talks
content: Russia launched its biggest drone and missile attack this year on Ukraine overnight, leaving hundreds of thousands without heating in freezing temperatures on Tuesday, just one day ahead of fresh talks aiming to find an end to the four-year war.

title: Haven't Heard From India About Stopping Purchases Of Russian Oil: Moscow
content: The Kremlin stated that it had not heard from India about halting Russian energy purchases after US President Donald Trump said that New Delhi had agreed to stop buying it as a part of the India-US trade deal.

title: Congress Leader's "Side Dish" Comment On Women In Politics Sparks Row
content: A Karnataka Congress leader's comment on women and glamour in politics has led to a barrage of criticism coming her way. The BJP called the Congress leader's remarks disrespectful to women.

title: "Ecstatic": Jaipur Jewellers Eye Export Rebound As US Cuts Tariffs
content: With exports of nearly Rs 18,000 crore, coloured gemstones and finished jewellery from Jaipur form the cornerstone of Rajasthan's economy, positioning the city as one of the world's most important gemstone hubs.

title: TGL highlights: Tiger Woods-less Jupiter Links upsets Atlanta Drive
content: tee shot on the first hole lands in the bunker and Max Homa's goes into the water as their team falls down 1-0 early . the team beat Atlanta 8-6, ending a losing streak that extended to January 2025 . Chris Gotterup sets the longest drive record at 374 yds .

title: Shaun White's next act? Revolutionizing snowboarding (again)
content: SHAUN WHITE, 39, has seen himself in a snowboard bib since he last competed at the 2022 Beijing winter Olympics . he will take a ceremonial run through the Buttermilk Mountain halfpipe to open the March 2025 contest that has brought him to town .

title: We pitched six Giannis trades to our resident GM -- he chose a blockbuster
content: the Bucks aren't actively looking to trade Giannis Antetokounmpo . the two-time MVP will have a new home by Thursday's deadline . four franchises have emerged as serious suitors .

title: Transfer window winners and losers: How Man City, Liverpool, PSG, others fared
content: the 2026 January transfer window has closed . the time has come and gone to strike the deals that will bolster teams for the second half of the season . some clubs enjoyed success over the past month . others were less fortunate, either failing in their attempts to add or losing huge talents .

title: AP Top 25 poll reaction: LSU moves into top five
content: the new AP Top 25 women's college basketball poll is out . the AP top 25 is out of the top five . ahead of Strong is Maya Moore with 11 and Breanna Stewart with 13 . UCLA becomes the seventh Big Ten tally .

title: Super Bowl squares: Printable grid for your Patriots-Seahawks party
content: the super bowl squares pool is one of the most popular games . we have you covered for super Bowl LX between the Seattle Seahawks and new England Patriots . you can draw numbers out of a hat, use a deck of cards or a random number generator .

title: What did he say? Why millions ride on the words of Super Bowl announcers
content: the average amount risked on NFL announcer mention markets has grown more than seven times . since September, the average risk on the market has grown from less than half a million per game at the start of the season to $3.55 million on the AFC and NFC championship games .

title: State of MLB: Has the Dodgers' dominance propelled the NL past the AL?
content: the national league was founded in 1876 by the Chicago White Stockings officer . it was a loose affiliation of clubs that had problems with competitive balance . in 1901, the American League declared itself a competitor to the NL, jumping up from its minor league status .

title: An epic Rookie of the Year race? This October's Trey Yesavage? 2026 predictions for MLB's top prospects
content: Kiley McDaniel has ranked the best prospects and farm systems in baseball ahead of the 2026 MLB season . the list includes Caden Scarborough, who will be a fixture in the Tigers' every-day lineup by the end of the season.

title: Panthers reveal custom 'Vamos Gatos' uniforms designed by Jonathan 'Rekal' Torres
content: "Vamos Gatos! Night" is the Panthers' annual celebration of the Hispanic community in south Florida . the 2025-26 jerseys, dropping on Monday, are the most intricate and intricate ones yet . this year's jerseys were designed by the very talented Rekal! graphic artist .
